scenarios.name: HLAS below threshold
scenarios.description: What if HLAS falls below the 5% threshold?

scenarios.name: SNS enters parliament
scenarios.description: What if SNS rises above the 5% threshold?

scenarios.name: HLAS voters to SMER
scenarios.description: 3% of HLAS voters switch to SMER

scenarios.name: PS-DEM coalition
scenarios.description: PS and Democrats run on a combined list

scenarios.name: Government collapse
scenarios.description: SMER drops 5%, split between PS and REP

scenarios.name: Opposition unity
scenarios.description: PS, SAS, DEM, KDH form unified opposition bloc (simplified as PS gaining their support)

scenarios.name: KDH and Hlas out
scenarios.description: KDH and HLAS out of parlament

en.title: Slovak Election Poll Analysis
en.subtitle: Interactive Kalman-filtered trends and statistical analysis
en.clickToHighlight: Click on a party in the legend to highlight it. Dashed lines show forecasts with 95% confidence intervals.
en.clickScenario: Click on a scenario to see detailed seat projections. These are pre-calculated based on current polling data.
en.dataSources: Data sources: Wikipedia opinion polling, various Slovak polling agencies

sk.title: Analýza volebných prieskumov SR
sk.subtitle: Interaktívne trendy s Kalmanovým filtrom a štatistická analýza
sk.clickToHighlight: Kliknite na stranu v legende pre zvýraznenie. Prerušované čiary zobrazujú predpovede s 95% intervalom spoľahlivosti.
sk.clickScenario: Kliknite na scenár pre zobrazenie detailných projekcií mandátov. Tieto sú prepočítané na základe aktuálnych prieskumov.
sk.dataSources: Zdroje dát: Wikipedia, rôzne slovenské agentúry
